body_text: The storage driver stores simple values directly instead of converting them to strings like localstorage would. Can we assume it returns numbers instead of doing the parseInt/isNaN dance?
body: The storage driver [stores simple values directly](http://normandy.readthedocs.io/en/latest/dev/driver.html#Storage) instead of converting them to strings like localstorage would. Can we assume it returns numbers instead of doing the parseInt/isNaN dance?
